This file is part of the very first assignment of IODS. Check out my [course diary](https://mkkjrv.github.io/IODS-project/).

The statistical methods of this course are:


**Regression and model validation**

*Simple regression*

*Multiple regression*

*Regression diagnostics*


**Logistic regression**

*Logistic regression*

*Cross validation: Training set and test set*


**Clustering and classification**

*K-means clustering (KMC)*

*Discriminant analysis (DA)*


**Dimensionality reduction techniques**

*Principal component analysis (PCA)*

*Correspondence analysis (CA, MCA)*
